channel.title: Afterlife 317 - What we all waited for / Need Staff!
channel.description:
[img][/img]Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?btw2w87r173fxea
Website: Currently in development Afterlife is a brand new server. We're here to offer you a great time, on a great server, we have a lot features on this server, such as bossing, pvping, and of course skilling! This server has been under develope for a while now, and is still under construction. Yet it is ready to be released! The developing team are spending their time, trying just to make the server good for YOU! Therefore we're hoping to see more faces!
Features: Bandos Boss Armadyl Boss Saradomin Boss Zamorak Boss Corporeal Beast Skilling PVPing Chaotics FREE DICING! Frost Dragons! ...And alot more!
Staff Team: // Need staff Owner(s): Mod Andrew Admin(s): Mod Nick Moderator(s): Sharkyscape (Need more)
We're hoping to see you on our server!
(Cant connect? add my skype: Nick.koufalis)
PICTURES: http://gyazo.com/9583d4f0725614facef41429d1bd7c89 - http://gyazo.com/6434a4b713bd772f10b1e7cbc47446a4 - http://gyazo.com/a2812c6febb6f3f21989d82475fe4bf6

@Bojanna1 wrote:

Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?btw2w87r173fxea

Website: Currently in development
Afterlife is a brand new server. We’re here to offer you a great time, on a great server, we have a lot features on this server, such as bossing, pvping, and of course skilling! This server has been under develope for a while now, and is still under construction. Yet it is ready to be released! The developing team are spending their time, trying just to make the server good for YOU! Therefore we’re hoping to see more faces!

Features:
Bandos Boss
Armadyl Boss
Saradomin Boss
Zamorak Boss
Corporeal Beast
Skilling
PVPing
Chaotics
FREE DICING!
Frost Dragons!
…And alot more!

We’re hoping to see you on our server!
